name: Set.Icc.coe_zero
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : OrderedSemiring α
⊢ Eq (↑0) 0
decl:
@[simp, norm_cast]
theorem coe_zero : ↑(0 : Icc (0 : α) 1) = (0 : α) :=
  rfl

name: Set.Icc.coe_one
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : OrderedSemiring α
⊢ Eq (↑1) 1
decl:
@[simp, norm_cast]
theorem coe_one : ↑(1 : Icc (0 : α) 1) = (1 : α) :=
  rfl

name: Set.Icc.mk_zero
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : OrderedSemiring α
h : Membership.mem (Set.Icc 0 1) 0
⊢ Eq ⟨0, h⟩ 0
decl:
@[simp]
theorem mk_zero (h : (0 : α) ∈ Icc (0 : α) 1) : (⟨0, h⟩ : Icc (0 : α) 1) = 0 :=
  rfl

name: Set.Icc.mk_one
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : OrderedSemiring α
h : Membership.mem (Set.Icc 0 1) 1
⊢ Eq ⟨1, h⟩ 1
decl:
@[simp]
theorem mk_one (h : (1 : α) ∈ Icc (0 : α) 1) : (⟨1, h⟩ : Icc (0 : α) 1) = 1 :=
  rfl

name: Set.Icc.coe_eq_zero
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : OrderedSemiring α
x : ↑(Set.Icc 0 1)
⊢ Iff (Eq (↑x) 0) (Eq x 0)
decl:
@[simp, norm_cast]
theorem coe_eq_zero {x : Icc (0 : α) 1} : (x : α) = 0 ↔ x = 0 := by
  symm
  exact Subtype.ext_iff

name: Set.Icc.coe_ne_zero
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : OrderedSemiring α
x : ↑(Set.Icc 0 1)
⊢ Iff (Ne (↑x) 0) (Ne x 0)
decl:
theorem coe_ne_zero {x : Icc (0 : α) 1} : (x : α) ≠ 0 ↔ x ≠ 0 :=
  not_iff_not.mpr coe_eq_zero

name: Set.Icc.coe_eq_one
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : OrderedSemiring α
x : ↑(Set.Icc 0 1)
⊢ Iff (Eq (↑x) 1) (Eq x 1)
decl:
@[simp, norm_cast]
theorem coe_eq_one {x : Icc (0 : α) 1} : (x : α) = 1 ↔ x = 1 := by
  symm
  exact Subtype.ext_iff

name: Set.Icc.coe_ne_one
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : OrderedSemiring α
x : ↑(Set.Icc 0 1)
⊢ Iff (Ne (↑x) 1) (Ne x 1)
decl:
theorem coe_ne_one {x : Icc (0 : α) 1} : (x : α) ≠ 1 ↔ x ≠ 1 :=
  not_iff_not.mpr coe_eq_one

name: Set.Icc.coe_nonneg
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : OrderedSemiring α
x : ↑(Set.Icc 0 1)
⊢ LE.le 0 ↑x
decl:
theorem coe_nonneg (x : Icc (0 : α) 1) : 0 ≤ (x : α) :=
  x.2.1

name: Set.Icc.coe_le_one
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : OrderedSemiring α
x : ↑(Set.Icc 0 1)
⊢ LE.le (↑x) 1
decl:
theorem coe_le_one (x : Icc (0 : α) 1) : (x : α) ≤ 1 :=
  x.2.2

name: Set.Icc.nonneg
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : OrderedSemiring α
t : ↑(Set.Icc 0 1)
⊢ LE.le 0 t
decl:
/-- like `coe_nonneg`, but with the inequality in `Icc (0:α) 1`. -/
theorem nonneg {t : Icc (0 : α) 1} : 0 ≤ t :=
  t.2.1

name: Set.Icc.le_one
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : OrderedSemiring α
t : ↑(Set.Icc 0 1)
⊢ LE.le t 1
decl:
/-- like `coe_le_one`, but with the inequality in `Icc (0:α) 1`. -/
theorem le_one {t : Icc (0 : α) 1} : t ≤ 1 :=
  t.2.2

name: Set.Icc.coe_mul
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : OrderedSemiring α
x y : ↑(Set.Icc 0 1)
⊢ Eq (↑(HMul.hMul x y)) (HMul.hMul ↑x ↑y)
decl:
@[simp, norm_cast]
theorem coe_mul (x y : Icc (0 : α) 1) : ↑(x * y) = (x * y : α) :=
  rfl

name: Set.Icc.coe_pow
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : OrderedSemiring α
x : ↑(Set.Icc 0 1)
n : Nat
⊢ Eq (↑(HPow.hPow x n)) (HPow.hPow (↑x) n)
decl:
@[simp, norm_cast]
theorem coe_pow (x : Icc (0 : α) 1) (n : ℕ) : ↑(x ^ n) = ((x : α) ^ n) :=
  rfl

name: Set.Icc.mul_le_left
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : OrderedSemiring α
x y : ↑(Set.Icc 0 1)
⊢ LE.le (HMul.hMul x y) x
decl:
theorem mul_le_left {x y : Icc (0 : α) 1} : x * y ≤ x :=
  (mul_le_mul_of_nonneg_left y.2.2 x.2.1).trans_eq (mul_one _)

name: Set.Icc.mul_le_right
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : OrderedSemiring α
x y : ↑(Set.Icc 0 1)
⊢ LE.le (HMul.hMul x y) y
decl:
theorem mul_le_right {x y : Icc (0 : α) 1} : x * y ≤ y :=
  (mul_le_mul_of_nonneg_right x.2.2 y.2.1).trans_eq (one_mul _)

name: Set.Icc.one_sub_mem
initialProofState:
β : Type u_2
inst✝ : OrderedRing β
t : β
ht : Membership.mem (Set.Icc 0 1) t
⊢ Membership.mem (Set.Icc 0 1) (HSub.hSub 1 t)
decl:
theorem one_sub_mem {t : β} (ht : t ∈ Icc (0 : β) 1) : 1 - t ∈ Icc (0 : β) 1 := by
  rw [mem_Icc] at *
  exact ⟨sub_nonneg.2 ht.2, (sub_le_self_iff _).2 ht.1⟩

name: Set.Icc.mem_iff_one_sub_mem
initialProofState:
β : Type u_2
inst✝ : OrderedRing β
t : β
⊢ Iff (Membership.mem (Set.Icc 0 1) t) (Membership.mem (Set.Icc 0 1) (HSub.hSub 1 t))
decl:
theorem mem_iff_one_sub_mem {t : β} : t ∈ Icc (0 : β) 1 ↔ 1 - t ∈ Icc (0 : β) 1 :=
  ⟨one_sub_mem, fun h => sub_sub_cancel 1 t ▸ one_sub_mem h⟩

name: Set.Icc.one_sub_nonneg
initialProofState:
β : Type u_2
inst✝ : OrderedRing β
x : ↑(Set.Icc 0 1)
⊢ LE.le 0 (HSub.hSub 1 ↑x)
decl: theorem one_sub_nonneg (x : Icc (0 : β) 1) : 0 ≤ 1 - (x : β) := by simpa using x.2.2

name: Set.Icc.one_sub_le_one
initialProofState:
β : Type u_2
inst✝ : OrderedRing β
x : ↑(Set.Icc 0 1)
⊢ LE.le (HSub.hSub 1 ↑x) 1
decl: theorem one_sub_le_one (x : Icc (0 : β) 1) : 1 - (x : β) ≤ 1 := by simpa using x.2.1

initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : StrictOrderedSemiring α
x : ↑(Set.Ioo 0 1)
⊢ LT.lt 0 ↑x
decl:
theorem pos (x : Ioo (0 : α) 1) : 0 < (x : α) :=
  x.2.1

name: Set.Ioo.lt_one
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : StrictOrderedSemiring α
x : ↑(Set.Ioo 0 1)
⊢ LT.lt (↑x) 1
decl:
theorem lt_one (x : Ioo (0 : α) 1) : (x : α) < 1 :=
  x.2.2

name: Set.Ioo.coe_mul
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : StrictOrderedSemiring α
x y : ↑(Set.Ioo 0 1)
⊢ Eq (↑(HMul.hMul x y)) (HMul.hMul ↑x ↑y)
decl:
@[simp, norm_cast]
theorem coe_mul (x y : Ioo (0 : α) 1) : ↑(x * y) = (x * y : α) :=
  rfl

name: Set.Ioo.one_sub_mem
initialProofState:
β : Type u_2
inst✝ : OrderedRing β
t : β
ht : Membership.mem (Set.Ioo 0 1) t
⊢ Membership.mem (Set.Ioo 0 1) (HSub.hSub 1 t)
decl:
theorem one_sub_mem {t : β} (ht : t ∈ Ioo (0 : β) 1) : 1 - t ∈ Ioo (0 : β) 1 := by
  rw [mem_Ioo] at *
  refine ⟨sub_pos.2 ht.2, ?_⟩
  exact lt_of_le_of_ne ((sub_le_self_iff 1).2 ht.1.le) (mt sub_eq_self.mp ht.1.ne')

name: Set.Ioo.mem_iff_one_sub_mem
initialProofState:
β : Type u_2
inst✝ : OrderedRing β
t : β
⊢ Iff (Membership.mem (Set.Ioo 0 1) t) (Membership.mem (Set.Ioo 0 1) (HSub.hSub 1 t))
decl:
theorem mem_iff_one_sub_mem {t : β} : t ∈ Ioo (0 : β) 1 ↔ 1 - t ∈ Ioo (0 : β) 1 :=
  ⟨one_sub_mem, fun h => sub_sub_cancel 1 t ▸ one_sub_mem h⟩

name: Set.Ioo.one_minus_pos
initialProofState:
β : Type u_2
inst✝ : OrderedRing β
x : ↑(Set.Ioo 0 1)
⊢ LT.lt 0 (HSub.hSub 1 ↑x)
decl: theorem one_minus_pos (x : Ioo (0 : β) 1) : 0 < 1 - (x : β) := by simpa using x.2.2

name: Set.Ioo.one_minus_lt_one
initialProofState:
β : Type u_2
inst✝ : OrderedRing β
x : ↑(Set.Ioo 0 1)
⊢ LT.lt (HSub.hSub 1 ↑x) 1
decl: theorem one_minus_lt_one (x : Ioo (0 : β) 1) : 1 - (x : β) < 1 := by simpa using x.2.1
